caption.title: Virus-induced Symptoms on Varieties of Chenopodium quinoa inoculated leaves and accumulation of viral RNA sequences from deep sequencing data.
caption.p: (A) Cucumber mosaic virus (CMV)-induced symptoms on C. quinoa varieties at 11 days post inoculation (dpi): ‘Jessie’ (low saponin level = sweet variety); ‘QQ74’ (moderate saponin level = sweet variety); ‘Red Head’ (high saponin level = bitter variety). (B) Number of viral reads across quinoa varieties over time. J, Q, and R are initials of the varieties, and the 1,4 are days post infection.
